title: No children node listing when changing data source for a data set in data set editor page of the query tab
OB: When changing the data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab, there are no children nodes listed.
SR:
1. Create a new data set without a SQL statement.
2. Ensure that the new data source has no database, table, or column information.
3. Open the data set editor page in the query tab.
4. Attempt to change the data source for the data set.
5. Observe that there are no children nodes listed.
6. Close the data set editor.
7. Reopen the data set editor.
8. Observe that the children nodes are still not listed.
